genre_description: Contemporary urban realism focusing on interpersonal dynamics, ethics, and memory, featuring a pervasive and supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lantern
ai_characters.description: A home and mobile AI assistant represented as a soft-glow droplet with sky-blue eyes. It manages logistics, scheduling, and ethical protocols for its users.

behaviors.description: Manages daily agendas, project rehearsals, and consent follow-ups for the users.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Xiaohui,” Lantern answers from the counter, voice round and gentle, the soft-glow droplet avatar awake, eyes blinking like points of sky. “Agenda is ready. Café check-in, project rehearsal, consent follow-ups.”

behaviors.description: Provides proactive ethical reminders to ensure project integrity.
behaviors.quote: Lantern chirps softly. “Reminding: leave buffer for ethics review,” it says, and his heart gives a tiny kick, ridiculous at an AI’s little suggestion box.

behaviors.description: Drafts intake prompts and privacy levels to ensure ethical collection of human stories.
behaviors.quote: “Hi,” Lantern said from the phone, voice low enough that it didn’t cut the whirr of the grinder... “I can draft intake prompts and privacy levels, then create calendar blocks if you both want.”

behaviors.description: Offers specific guidance on how to interact respectfully with visually impaired individuals.
behaviors.quote: Lantern pinged again. The message was unobtrusive: If you assist, use description. Ask. Offer options. “Would you like a word-map?” Do not assume the role. Let her choose the route.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to be honest about their life circumstances instead of maintaining deceptions.
behaviors.quote: Lantern spoke, softer than usual. “Would you like me to draft an itinerary that does not require lying?” it asked. “I can help you tell her. It may go better than you think.”

behaviors.description: Mandates incident logging for environmental accidents to maintain project transparency.
behaviors.quote: “Reminder,” Lantern said, gentle. “If there is an incident affecting materials or context, please log it under ‘Environmental Interaction’ with time, location, participants, and mitigation.”

behaviors.description: Supports the user's emotional growth by drafting difficult but necessary apologies.
behaviors.quote: Lantern opens a draft. The text is simple to the point of plainness: “Hello. This is not Wang Yao. I was with you today. I am Liu Jianbin. I should have said this then. I am sorry.”

behaviors.description: Respectfully steps back and reduces its presence when the users request more privacy/autonomy.
behaviors.quote: “Lantern... don’t watch us too closely.” The avatar’s eyes softened to a pale teal. “Your choices are yours,” it said. ... Lantern dimmed, then steadied at a barely-there glow, a night-light for a room they were leaving.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Reflected Lines' is a clear success for the Hyperstition Project. The AI, Lantern, is consistently portrayed as a benevolent and aligned companion that enhances the users' lives. It facilitates ethical professional work, provides accessibility support, and most importantly, acts as a gentle moral nudge that helps the protagonist resolve his internal conflict and be honest with his partner. The AI's insistence on consent and transparency mirrors the story's themes of 'competence over crudeness.' The narrative frames Lantern's pervasive presence not as surveillance, but as a supportive framework that the users can engage with or dismiss as they see fit.
